field.name: summary
field.value: TableGenerator - Setting ColumnType to StringClob doesn't make the field a Blob sub_type 1 in Firebird

field.name: description
field.value:
If I declare a property like: [Property(ColumnType = "StringClob")]
It's supposed to get the type "Blob sub_type 1" in Firebird, but it results in a field of the the type VarChar(255) instead.
If I declare it like this : [Property(Length = 100000)] it works and is indeed a "Blob sub_type 1"
This is probably a NHibernate issue, but just to be sure I'm reporting it anyway.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: setting length to 10000 is the suggested solution.
